18 namespace libmolgrid {

20 template<typename Dt, std::size_t ND> class ManagedGrid; //predeclare
21 
22 inline cudaMemcpyKind copyKind(bool srcCUDA, bool destCUDA) {
23  if (srcCUDA) {
24  if (destCUDA)
25  return cudaMemcpyDeviceToDevice;
26  else
27  return cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost;
28  } else { //source host
29  if (destCUDA)
30  return cudaMemcpyHostToDevice;
31  else
32  return cudaMemcpyHostToHost;
33  }
34 }
35 
43 template<typename Dtype, std::size_t NumDims, bool isCUDA = false>
44 class Grid {
45  protected:
46  //these should be read only, but I need to set them in the constructor
47  //outside an initializer list, so hide them
48  Dtype * buffer;
49  size_t dims[NumDims];
50  size_t offs[NumDims];
51 
52  template<typename... I>
53  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline size_t getPos(I... indices) const {
54  static_assert(NumDims == sizeof...(indices),"Incorrect number of grid indices");
55 
56  size_t idx[NumDims] = { static_cast<size_t>(indices)...};
57  size_t pos = 0;
58  #pragma unroll
59  for(unsigned i = 0; i < NumDims; i++) { //surely the compiler will unroll this...
60  pos += idx[i]*offs[i];
61  }
62  return pos;
63  }
64 
65  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER void check_index(size_t i, size_t dim) const {
66 #ifndef __CUDA_ARCH__
67  if(i >= dim) {
68  throw std::out_of_range("Invalid range. "+itoa(i) + " >= " + itoa(dim));
69  }
70 #else
71  assert(i < dim);
72 #endif
73  }
74 
75  public:
76  using type = Dtype;
77  using subgrid_t = Grid<Dtype,NumDims-1,isCUDA>;
78  using managed_t = ManagedGrid<Dtype,NumDims>;
79  using cpu_grid_t = Grid<Dtype,NumDims,false>;
80  using gpu_grid_t = Grid<Dtype,NumDims,true>;
81 
82  static constexpr size_t N = NumDims;
83  static constexpr bool GPU = isCUDA;
84 
86  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline const size_t * dimensions() const { return dims; }
88  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline size_t dimension(size_t i) const { check_index(i,NumDims); return dims[i]; }
89 
91  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline const size_t * offsets() const { return offs; }
93  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline size_t offset(size_t i) const { return offs[i]; }
94 
96  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline size_t size() const {
97  size_t ret = 1;
98  for(unsigned i = 0; i < NumDims; i++) {
99  ret *= dims[i];
100  }
101  return ret;
102  }
103 
105  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline Dtype * data() const { return buffer; }
106 
108  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline void set_buffer(Dtype *ptr) { buffer = ptr; }
109 
111  Grid(): buffer(nullptr), dims{0}, offs{0} {
112 
113  }
114 
119  template<typename... I>
120  Grid(Dtype *const d, I... sizes):
121  buffer(d), dims{ static_cast<size_t>(sizes)...} {
122  static_assert(NumDims == sizeof...(sizes),"Incorrect number of grid dimensions");
123  offs[NumDims-1] = 1;
124  #pragma unroll
125  for(int i = NumDims-1; i > 0; i--) {
126  offs[i-1] = dims[i]*offs[i];
127  }
128  }
129 
134  Grid(Dtype *const d, size_t *sizes):
135  buffer(d) {
136  offs[NumDims-1] = 1;
137  #pragma unroll
138  for(int i = NumDims-1; i > 0; i--) {
139  dims[i] = sizes[i];
140  offs[i-1] = dims[i]*offs[i];
141  }
142  dims[0] = sizes[0];
143  }
144 
145  Grid(const Grid&) = default;
146  ~Grid() = default;
147 
154  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER subgrid_t operator[](size_t i) const {
155  check_index(i, dims[0]);
156  return Grid<Dtype,NumDims-1,isCUDA>(*this, i);
157  }
158 
162  template<typename... I>
163  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline Dtype& operator()(I... indices) {
164  return buffer[getPos(indices...)];
165  }
166 
167  template<typename... I>
168  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline Dtype operator()(I... indices) const {
169  return buffer[getPos(indices...)];
170  }
171 
173  template<typename... I>
174  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline Dtype* address(I... indices) {
175  return &buffer[getPos(indices...)];
176  }
177 
178  template<typename... I>
179  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline const Dtype* address(I... indices) const {
180  return &buffer[getPos(indices...)];
181  }
182 
187  template<bool destCUDA>
188  size_t copyTo(Grid<Dtype,NumDims,destCUDA>& dest) const {
189  size_t sz = std::min(size(), dest.size());
190  if(sz == 0) return 0;
191  cudaMemcpyKind kind = copyKind(isCUDA,destCUDA);
192  LMG_CUDA_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(dest.data(),data(),sz*sizeof(Dtype),kind));
193  return sz;
194  }
195 
200  template<bool srcCUDA>
201  size_t copyFrom(const Grid<Dtype,NumDims,srcCUDA>& src) {
202  size_t sz = std::min(size(), src.size());
203  if(sz == 0) return 0;
204  cudaMemcpyKind kind = copyKind(srcCUDA,isCUDA);
205  LMG_CUDA_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(data(),src.data(),sz*sizeof(Dtype),kind));
206  return sz;
207  }
208 
212  void fill_zero() {
213  if(isCUDA) cudaMemset(data(), 0, sizeof(Dtype)*size());
214  else memset(data(), 0, sizeof(Dtype)*size());
215  }
216 
217  // constructor used by operator[], create a subgrid, assuming memory is allocated
218  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER
219  explicit Grid(const Grid<Dtype,NumDims+1,isCUDA>& G, size_t i): buffer(G.data() ? &G.data()[i*G.offset(0)] : nullptr) {
220  //slice off first dimension
221  for(size_t i = 0; i < NumDims; i++) {
222  dims[i] = G.dimension(i+1);
223  offs[i] = G.offset(i+1);
224  }
225  }
226 
227 };
228 
229 // class specialization of grid to make final operator[] return scalar
230 // Note: if we start adding more functionality to Grid, we will need
231 // to refactor this into a separate GridAccessor class
232 template<typename Dtype, bool isCUDA >
233 class Grid<Dtype,1,isCUDA> {
234  protected:
235  Dtype * buffer;
236  size_t dims[1];
237 
238  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER void check_index(size_t i, size_t dim) const {
239 #ifndef __CUDA_ARCH__
240  if(i >= dim) {
241  throw std::out_of_range("Invalid range. "+ itoa(i) + " >= " + itoa(dim));
242  }
243 #else
244  assert(i < dim);
245 #endif
246  }
247  public:
248  using type = Dtype;
249  using subgrid_t = Dtype;
250  using managed_t = ManagedGrid<Dtype,1>;
251  using cpu_grid_t = Grid<Dtype,1,false>;
252  using gpu_grid_t = Grid<Dtype,1,true>;
253 
254  static constexpr size_t N = 1;
255  static constexpr bool GPU = isCUDA;
256 
258  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline const size_t * dimensions() const { return dims; }
260  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline size_t dimension(size_t i) const { check_index(i, 1); return dims[i]; }
261 
263  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline size_t size() const { return dims[0]; }
264 
266  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline Dtype * data() const { return buffer; }
267 
268  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline size_t offset(size_t i) const { return 1; }
269 
271  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline void set_buffer(Dtype *ptr) { buffer = ptr; }
272 
273  Grid(): buffer(nullptr), dims{0} { }
274 
275  Grid(Dtype* const d, size_t sz):
276  buffer(d), dims{sz} { }
277 
278  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline Dtype& operator[](size_t i) {
279  check_index(i,dims[0]);
280  return buffer[i];
281  }
282 
283  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline Dtype operator[](size_t i) const {
284  check_index(i,dims[0]);
285  return buffer[i];
286  }
287 
288  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline Dtype& operator()(size_t a) {
289  return buffer[a];
290  }
291 
292  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER inline Dtype operator()(size_t a) const {
293  return buffer[a];
294  }
295 
296  void fill_zero() {
297  if(isCUDA) cudaMemset(data(), 0, sizeof(Dtype)*size());
298  else memset(data(), 0, sizeof(Dtype)*size());
299  }
300 
301  //only called from regular Grid
302  CUDA_CALLABLE_MEMBER
303  explicit Grid<Dtype,1,isCUDA>(const Grid<Dtype,2,isCUDA>& G, size_t i):
304  buffer(&G.data()[i*G.offset(0)]), dims{G.dimension(1)} {}
305 
306 
307  template<bool destCUDA>
308  size_t copyTo(Grid<Dtype,1,destCUDA>& dest) const {
309  size_t sz = std::min(size(), dest.size());
310  if(sz == 0) return sz;
311  cudaMemcpyKind kind = copyKind(isCUDA,destCUDA);
312  LMG_CUDA_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(dest.data(),data(),sz*sizeof(Dtype),kind));
313  return sz;
314  }
315 
316  template<bool srcCUDA>
317  size_t copyFrom(const Grid<Dtype,1,srcCUDA>& src) {
318  size_t sz = std::min(size(), src.size());
319  if(sz == 0) return sz;
320  cudaMemcpyKind kind = copyKind(srcCUDA,isCUDA);
321  LMG_CUDA_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(data(),src.data(),sz*sizeof(Dtype),kind));
322  return sz;
323  }
324 
325 };
326 
327 #define EXPAND_GRID_DEFINITIONS(Z,SIZE,_) \
328 typedef Grid<float, SIZE, false> Grid##SIZE##f; \
329 typedef Grid<double, SIZE, false> Grid##SIZE##d; \
330 typedef Grid<float, SIZE, true> Grid##SIZE##fCUDA; \
331 typedef Grid<double, SIZE, true> Grid##SIZE##dCUDA;
332 
333 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(1,LIBMOLGRID_MAX_GRID_DIM, EXPAND_GRID_DEFINITIONS, 0);
334 
335 }
